subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: Usage limits apply, varying by model and demand (higher limits for GPT-4o during peak hours compared to GPT-4).
5x higher usage limits than the free tier, with access to Claude 3.5 Sonnet, 3 Opus, and 3 Haiku.
Part of Google One AI Premium; includes access to Gemini 1.5 Pro, 1.5 Flash, and 1.0 Ultra, plus 2TB of storage.

llama_3.pricing_model: Hybrid: Open Source (Self-Hosted) vs. Cloud Hosted

self_hosted.limit_description: Free for commercial use for companies with <700M monthly active users. Infrastructure costs apply.

copilot_pro.features: Access in Windows, Office web apps, Teams, priority access to latest models like GPT-4o, and image creation capabilities.

copilot_for_microsoft_365.features: Full integration into Office desktop apps (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook), Teams, and business-grade data protection.

pricing_analysis.subscription_adoption_trend: The ~$20/month subscription tier (ChatGPT Plus, Claude Pro, Copilot Pro, Gemini Advanced) has become the standard for premium consumer access, offering unlimited use within fair-use policies and access to the latest models.
pricing_analysis.trend: Aggressive price competition and a race for efficiency. Top-tier models (GPT-4o, Claude 3.5 Sonnet) are now 50-75% cheaper than previous-generation flagships. New entrants like DeepSeek and open-weight models like Llama 3 hosted on clouds are disrupting the market with ultra-low per-token costs, forcing all players to lower prices and optimize architectures (e.g., Mixture of Experts).
